posts.caption: Restart Android Club Course
posts.description:
Android Basics [60 Hours + 12 Hours Workshops]
Introduction to Android

Android Architecture overview

Android Application Fundamentals

User Interface

Main Building Blocks

Resources

Data Storage

Android Media Player

Location

Android Threading and Networking

Fragments

Instructor Biography:
Amr Mohsen is a Co-Founder and CTO of RESTART Technology and Founder of HumYum, a platform for online cooking.
He is working as Study Group Leader at Mobile Launchpad program with Google, Udacity and iTi to provide the best training for the program interns, worked with AMIT, Orascom for Training & Technology, AASMTT as Android instructor, Former GSA and GSA Adviser, and a mobile Entrepreneur, worked at Starware as Android developer, He graduated from Computer Science, El-Shorouk academy. through the previous 3 years, he gave 12 sessions about Android, created 24 workshop in Android development, trained more than 200 students.


Course :- [6 weeks] 
Cost :- 1200 L.E after one week
Early Bird 1000 L.E

Register Now: http://goo.gl/forms/soHf9a9Erq

استفسار بسيط بخصوص AJAX و PHP
بستعمل Framework اسمه cjax وده لكتابة الاجاكس بال PHP بدون اي كتابة للجافا سكربت ولكن مشكلة هذا ال Framework ان اخر تحديث له كان في 2012

انا عايز اكتب اجاكس من غير ما اتعرض للجافاسكربت
شكرا
posts.caption: phpajax.net
posts.description: Cjax is an MVC (Model-View-Controller) oriented, lightweight (>100kb) ajax framework aimed at PHP applications/sites. It allows you to literally execute JavaScript with PHP, sounds facinating - eh? Well it's true (You may test some demos).
